rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0001
rows.name:
I don't get it...
Why would they be so bent on killing all humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0002
rows.name: Who can say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Whatever the reason, this is dire news.
We should let the others know ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0004
rows.name: Let's call it in and head back to HQ for a full debrief.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Roger that. And here I'd just started
to hope we'd finally escaped all this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0006
rows.name: Escape! Yes, escape! Tatsu also want escape![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0007
rows.name: Friends! Friends not leave Tatsu trapped![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0008
rows.name: More xenos?! Wh-what should we do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0009
rows.name: Stay back, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0010
rows.name: What do you think, Rook?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0010
rows.name: Be Bold

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0011
rows.name: Open the crate.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0020
rows.name: Play It Safe

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest leaving the crate as is.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0011
rows.name: Finally! Dance of freedom! Tatsu thanks you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0012
rows.name: Yeah, let's leave this stone unturned.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0013
rows.name: "Better safe...", right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0014
rows.name: Oh-ho! Tatsu safe! And Tatsu not stone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Mamapon always said Tatsu should help friends in need.
This time, Tatsu need friends' help![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0030
rows.name: Have Pity

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0031
rows.name: Open the container.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0040
rows.name: Show No Mercy

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0041
rows.name: Listen to him suffer.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0016
rows.name: Finally! Tatsu almost suffocated in there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0017
rows.name: Dark...so dark. Tatsu...can't...breathe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh? Oh-ho?! Tatsu finally free![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0019
rows.name: Interesting...one of the vegetables is sentient.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0020
rows.name: A talking potato...Wonder if it tastes different, too?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0021_m
rows.name:
I know what we're having for dinner tonight!
You don't know it yet, New Guy, but I'm a pretty mean cook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0021_f
rows.name:
I know what we're having for dinner tonight!
You don't know it yet, New Girl, but I'm a pretty mean cook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0022
rows.name:
You ARE mean! Mean and cruel!
Tatsu definitely not potato![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Tatsu explain this to dumb and smelly Prone
when they take Tatsu! But Prone not listen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Prone never listen. All Nopon rue day
Prone first set stinky feet on Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Especially Tatsu. Tatsu witness Prone abuse firsthand!
At this rate, entire Nopon race in danger![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0026
rows.name: Yes! Nopon are endangered species![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0027
rows.name:
So really, friends have social responsibility
to protect Tatsu from danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0028
rows.name: Uh-huh. Whattaya think, Elma? Bake or fry?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0029
rows.name: Wait a minute.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0030
rows.name:
The beings who captured you—big brutes in armor?
Little pointy ears?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0031
rows.name: Yes—Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0032
rows.name:
And they're a more recent arrival here, is that right?
They're not native to this planet?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0033
rows.name: Not native—recent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0034
rows.name:
If friends want more details,
friends must promise to protect Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0035
rows.name: Only then will Tatsu talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0036
rows.name: Right—Elma you hold him, I'll peel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0037
rows.name: Tatsu will talk! Tatsu will talk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0038
rows.name:
F-friends not get Nopon sense of humor, is all!
Oh-ho-ho-hooo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0039
rows.name: So if I understand correctly...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0040
rows.name:
This is your homeworld—
the Nopon people are native to Mira. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0041
rows.name:
And then just recently, the Prone show up and
quickly hunt you to the edge of extinction. Is that right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0042
rows.name: Not just Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0043
rows.name:
Prone and their nasty, evil buddies.
Lots and lots of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0044
rows.name: Their buddies? You mean other alien races?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0045
rows.name: Other HUNGRY alien races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0046
rows.name:
They all gang up on Nopon.
They do horrible, terrible things to Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0047
rows.name: Someday, Tatsu will turn tables and eat THEM for a change![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0050
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0051
rows.name: Show Tatsu you mean him no harm.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0060
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0061
rows.name: Stare hungrily at Tatsu.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Then...you'll help Tatsu? Protect Tatsu?!
Ohh, happy day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0049
rows.name:
It settled then.
In return, Tatsu will accompany friends back to their village![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0050
rows.name:
T-Tatsu has seen those eyes before!
Hungry eyes, like Prone eyes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0051
rows.name: Tatsu is here to serve, not BE served![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0052
rows.name:
Yeah, seriously! What kind of barbarian
would want to eat this little guy, just like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0053
rows.name:
We should take care of him.
Wash and clean him. Season him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0054
rows.name:
That's right, that's right.
This is exactly what Tatsu is saying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0055
rows.name:
Take Tatsu to your village.
Wash and clean Tatsu. Season Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0056
rows.name: Er, uh...wait.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0057
rows.name: What do you think—take him with us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0058
rows.name:
He seems harmless enough. And he'd be a good
source of information on Mira and the Prone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0059
rows.name: All right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0060
rows.name: We can debrief him when we report to Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0061
rows.name:
As long as he passes the quarantine scan,
we can bring him back to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0062
rows.name: Right, let's get that out of the way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0063
rows.name: All clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0064
rows.name: Then Tatsu can join friends?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0065_m
rows.name:
Dance of joy!
New friends are friendliest friends ever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0065_f
rows.name:
Dance of joy!
New friends are friendliest friends ever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0066
rows.name: ...I know![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0067
rows.name:
Tatsu has special thank-you gift for friends
for saving Tatsu's life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0068
rows.name: Tatsu will lend it to friends for free.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0069
rows.name: Lend? It's not a gift if you don't give it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0070
rows.name: Guh-guh-GIVE it away? For always?! For FREE?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0071
rows.name: This would be insulting, to friends and to Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0072
rows.name:
No Nopon merchant worth his
salt and pepper could do such a thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0073
rows.name: Tatsu is grateful, but Tatsu not INSANE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0074
rows.name:
What, it's insane to think if someone SAVES your LIFE,
you might actually show them some real—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0075
rows.name: ...Aaand he's not even listening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0076_m
rows.name:
Friend, do you ever get lost?
Tired of bulky maps and flawed memory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0076_f
rows.name:
Friend, do you ever get lost?
Tired of bulky maps and flawed memory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Tatsu there's got to be a better way.

rows.label: xs03060100_JNK0080
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs03060100_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Tatsu that not all who wander are lost.

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0077
rows.name:
There IS a better way.
Friends, this is your lucky day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0078
rows.name: Friend jokes with Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0079
rows.name:
Joke funny now. But joke not so funny
when friend "wander" into lophid-filled lake on accident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0080
rows.name: Presenting...Follow Ball![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0081
rows.name:
Follow Ball is number-one ultimate
best super-secret must-have Nopon item![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0082_m
rows.name:
If friends get lost out in wild,
friends just follow ball of light to safety![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0082_f
rows.name:
If friends get lost out in wild,
friends just follow ball of light to safety![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0083
rows.name: And now, it's yours! For free! To borrow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0084
rows.name: ...For now, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0085
rows.name:
Really? "Follow Ball"? That's the best name
you could come up with for your super-special thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0086
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0087
rows.name: What would friend prefer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0088
rows.name: Fancy name no one understand so friend can feel smart? Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0089
rows.name: Now...time for Nopon dance of generosity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0090
rows.name: I dunno... Is that thing really gonna be all that useful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0091
rows.name: What if it's a trap, or—BOOM! It just blows up in our faces?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0092
rows.name: Ah yes, that reminds Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0093
rows.name:
If Follow Ball get damaged, Tatsu need to
charge friends full price. Plus restock fee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03060100_MSG0094
rows.name: So much for "dance of generosity."[ST:wait ]
